```{r}
#load package lattice
library(lattice)
library(xtable) # generate the LaTeX code for tables
#fix the random generator seed
set.seed(123)
#create data
data <- rnorm(1000)
#plot histogram
h <- histogram(data)
#plot density 
densityplot(data^12 / data^10, xlab = expression(data^12/data^10))
#plot stripplot
stripplot(data^2, xlab = expression(data^2))
#plot boxplot
bwplot(exp(data))
#matrix with all data used
data.all <- cbind(data = data, 
                  squared1 = data^12 / data^10,
                  squared2 = data^2,
                  exponent = exp(data))


xtable(data.all[1:9,])

pdf("histogram.pdf")
print(histogram)
dev.off()

pdf("density.pdf")
print(densityplot)
dev.off()

pdf("stripplot.pdf")
print(stripplot)
dev.off()

pdf("bwplot.pdf")
print(bwplot)
dev.off()
```
